member.name: T:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1
member.summary: A base class for disposables that need exactly-once semantics in a threadsafe way.
member.typeparam: The type of "context" for the derived disposable.

member.name: F:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1._context
member.summary: The context. This may be null.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Creates a disposable for the specified context.
member.param: The context passed to . If this is null, then will never be called.

member.name: M:Nito.Disposables.SingleDisposable`1.Dispose(`0)
member.summary: The actul disposal method, called only once from . If the context passed to the constructor of this instance is null, then this method is never called.
member.param: The context for the disposal operation. This is never null.
